resources.string: Convert between Arabic and Roman numerals
Invalid Roman numeral or out of range
• Convert numbers between Arabic (123) and Roman (CXXIII) systems.
• You can type in either field and it will convert automatically.

• Why this limit? The classic Roman numeral system only uses I, V, X, L, C, D and M. The largest number you can write with these is 3999 (MMMCMXCIX). Larger numbers used special symbols or overlines that aren\'t commonly used today.
